comments: Love love professor Lowery. She\'s young and blonde lol. She gives you the confidence boost to speak better in front of others. I came into this class dreading it but my last speech I aced it and couldn\'t have done it without all of her help, plus the practice of many speeches. If you\'re taking speech, go with her! Truly the best and funny too.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Respected (3)  Inspirational (3)  Hilarious (3)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)
comments: Professor Meghan Lowery is one of the best teachers that I ever had. If anyone is taking speech 100, I would recommend you pick her for your professor. Not only is she is an easier grader but she makes her classes fun and you will have an good time.
